articles.content: MIAMI -- A former American diplomat who served as U.S. ambassador to Bolivia has been arrested in a long-running FBI counterintelligence investigation, accused of secretly serving as an agent of Cuba… [+3917 chars]

articles.title: Muslim leaders in swing states vow not to back Biden in 2024 over handling of Israel-Hamas war - Fox News
articles.description: A growing backlash among Muslim and Arab Americans against Biden over his handling of the Israel-Hamas war. Muslim leaders in swing states have vowed not to back his re-election.
articles.content:
President Bidens campaign for re-election in 2024 is facing growing pressure from Muslim Americans who have vowed not to back him over his handling of the Israel-Hamas war.
